REVIEW.Name: Staff
REVIEW.RHighlight: This is a perfect villa if you’re looking for a beautifully designed space that stands out from the crowd. Its architecture and interior design make this a very individual and Instagrammable choice. Set in a rice field, it’s a great little hideaway from the rest of the world where you can keep yourself entertained both day and night. It’s also super close to where the action is, and a great starting point for exploring everything Canggu and Bali have to offer.
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
I knew we’d be in for a treat the moment we arrived at the entrance of Villa Kayajiwa. The contemporary dark façade suggested something pretty unique and stylish would be hiding behind those walls.
As a great fan of modern architecture and clever design, I could tell this villa was designed as a place to relax, entertain and impress. As far as we were concerned, it more than delivered on all three accounts.
From the antique Balinese doors in the living room with door handles in the shape of a hand (door hand-le, get it?) to the original art work in every room, the owner has clearly put a lot of thought into choosing ornaments that each tell their own story.
The villa is shaped around a large lawn and a beautiful 25-metre pool which flows into a spacious Jacuzzi, all providing the perfect backdrop for endless sunbathing, evening cocktails and morning laps.
The moat around the garden was one of my favourite design features. The gentle sound of running water created a sense of being in an oasis, far away from the stresses of daily life.
We loved the big furnished roof terrace too. Not only is it a perfect sun trap during the day, but it also doubled up as a great spot for catching the sunset, as well as for some late-night handholding and stargazing.
In fairness, the karaoke room was a little wasted on us. After about ten minutes of torture, my partner and I realised the singing was putting our relationship in jeopardy. Having said that, if karaoke is your thing or indeed if you’re a masochist, then this purpose-built room will give you an extra reason for choosing this villa.
Not that you’ll need any more reasons. From the impressive modern design, the super helpful staff, the excellent location, this villa has incredible character and gets top marks from us.
REVIEW.RUnpleasantSurprise:
The volcanic stone walls can give the indoor spaces a dark feel during the day. The clever and cozy lighting at night more than make up for that though.
The jacuzzi is an extension of the pool and therefore not heated, making it a little too chilly to be used at night.
The solid wooden dining room table is stunning, but the seats are a bit uncomfortable and were probably not designed with a tall person in mind.

REVIEW.Name: Nurdian Cuaca
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa, staff are very attentive and very resourceful! We have wonderful four days here.

REVIEW.Name: Airbnb (15.5)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay was amazing here at Kayajiwa, the staff are super helpful and nice, willing to help with anything. Would 100% stay here again! Thank you so much to all the staff. Villa is amazing, staff are absolutely wonderful and they were helpful with any of our needs.

REVIEW.Name: Jason Sentanu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great stay! Love the place, especially the pool. Excellent service - very caring friendly. Definitely will come back for another vacation. 10/10.

REVIEW.Name: Jaimee Lupton
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for having us here, we had a good time. Every one was really nice and helpful. I loved swimming in the pool. Amazing villa, we enjoyed every minute, fantastic staff and so relaxing. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Nadira Putri Irianto
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had a very good times staying at Kayajiwa. The vibe is great, the staff is very nice, we hope we can stay here longer.

REVIEW.Name: Hannah Walker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for an amazing stay at Villa Kayajiwa we enjoyed everything. Pool, rooms, architecture, food, staff and service. 10/10 for all areas. Look forward to returning soon.

REVIEW.Name: Merlin KHIRI TRAVEL
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for taking such good care of us and our three little granddaughters. The villa is lovely and we are grateful for your kind help. We will miss Kayajiwa Villa. Thank you for a wonderful stay at this beautiful villa. We will definitely return to stunning Canggu.

REVIEW.Name: Maya Morris
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for your hospitality, Kayajiwa Villa is magnificent. Great place to stay, we loved it here. Treat yourself! Thank you... so much gratitude for this experience.

REVIEW.Name: Airbnb (15.5)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Perfect staff! Perfect stay! Perfect villa!

REVIEW.Name: VillaNaBali (PT Seacrest Management)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A wonderful place to stay with excellent staff who will help at any moment. Pleasant atmosphere, thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Yeni Margia
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great villa with wonderful design and friendly staff. Had a really good time, thank you, amazing stay.

REVIEW.Name: Imagine Travel Co.,Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Service kind, delicious food and BBQ's very good. I will choose Villa Kayajiwa next time.
